item.title: What’s the Time Burden of Women’s Cancers-Related Tasks?
item.description: Patients with metastatic breast or advanced ovarian cancer spend about 7 hours per week on cancer-related tasks, including frequent travel and waiting...

item.title: Gender Gap Persists in Post-Stroke Recovery
item.description: Women experience worse post-stroke functional outcomes and have different recovery patterns compared to men, a new study shows. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Common Chemicals Tied to Increased MS Risk
item.description: Exposure to common environmental chemicals, especially in combination, is linked to an increased risk of multiple sclerosis. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Should AI Tools For Doctors Be Licensed Like Doctors?

item.title: Liquid Biopsy Test Promising for Detecting Early-Onset CRC?
